doc.title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
doc.author: David Demaret
doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: The Lost City by David Demaret

main.head: The Lost City
main.p: David Demaret is an expert senior graphic artist working in the videogame industry for the last twenty years. He is an art director and a scifi and heroic-fantasy illustrator as it is his real passion, a passion that comes from classic sci-fi masters like Chris Foss, John Berkey and the likes . . .
